message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $16,000 to start the negotiations. What do you think?
Alice, your initial offer is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $10,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  While I'm hoping to get a bit more than that, I'm willing to be flexible. How about we meet halfway at $13,000?

Alice, I understand you want to get a good price, but $13,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $11,000, which is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me.  Let me know if you're open to this.
